name: Human Racer AR
description: Race against your friends in augmented reality. Project a virtual track in your living room and compete for the best time.

name: VR Speed Runner
description: Experience the thrill of high-speed racing in stunning virtual reality environments. Dodge obstacles and outpace your opponents to claim victory.

name: City Sprint VR
description: Race through futuristic cityscapes in this fast-paced VR racing game. Master the tracks and become the ultimate urban racer.
